title: Advance Wars: Dual Strike
description: The matches in Advance Wars have become very popular in many different platforms. For each version, it has certain customization, Advance Wars: Dual Strike will give players a chance to lead their new Commanding Officers. In these battles, your opponent will be the Black Hole Army. Huge battles with diverse scales and battles will make players change the face of war.

title: Aliens: Infestation
description: Before zombies became a hot topic for many game makers to exploit, Alien was always the focus. They deserve a tough opponent because all these creatures are full of imagination, the power can be customized according to the author’s idea and the infinite amount of space. Such games, about ten years ago, were one of the most popular products. If you join Alien with shooting games, it will surely create the most compelling battle, making the player always get caught up in the whirls of war that can’t be stopped.

title: Animal Crossing: Wild World
description:
Cross over to a brand new world!

Much of the cast of the original Animal Crossing returns, including animals of all shapes and personality types: K.K. Slider, Tom Nook, Blathers, Mr. Resetti and more. There are also a number of new characters.

Players move into village, buy a small house and then do whatever they want. Time and seasons pass as they do in the real world, so there will always be something unpredictable happening. Collect or buy items, talk to neighbors, go fishing, catch bugs, dig up treasure or hang out with human friends.

title: Art Academy
description: Art is one of the best entertainment aspects of people because it makes them feel relaxed and increase their creativity. Therefore, since ancient times, people want to learn to draw a lot, but until the present era, everything is more comfortable. Children who are brought to drawing centers or drawing schools in universities are also favored. But if you want to learn amateur, serving entertainment needs is too simple. You only need to download applications that can be acquired online. For example, if you have a DS device, try out Art Academy 2010, which was released at Nintendo.

title: Assassin’s Creed II: Discovery
description: Assassin’s Creed is one of the successful series Ubisoft’s best. Until now, the latest part of the game has been working very well. Although there are conflicting opinions that the Odyssey has lost the essence of this game, it is still a good part of the game. If you want to try something interesting in this series, you should probably try Assassin’s Creed, which is released on the DS operating system. Assassin’s Creed II: Discovery 2009 is perhaps an interesting game to experiment with. It is still a part of the cannon in the series, but it doesn’t get too much involved with other parts. So you can freely play without fear of being disappointed by the lack of knowledge of the previous sections. Even if you’re done playing this part and returning to the latest parts of the series, it’s still normal.

title: Avalon Code
description: At the time of 2009, there are many famous role-playing products that are watched and played by fans all over the world. The best examples such as Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest, even names like Nostalgia and Sands of Destruction also made the race to the hearts of fans become much more fierce. That point Rising Star Games must make a difference to attract the attention of players worldwide. Avalon Code is the key to breaking the game market.

title: Avatar: The Game
description: A long time ago, Avarta was well known in the entertainment world as the first film to be produced with 3D graphics and widely released across the globe. Thanks to this, at that time, it was one of the most exciting topics. The follower products are welcome everywhere. Indeed, the game market is reclaiming everything from this brand. Avatar: The Game is a genuine product, with official permission.

title: Bakugan: Battle Brawlers
description:
Dominate the Arena!

Answer the call to BRAWL and enter an alternative universe where good and evil fight for domination! Only you can decide the fate of the galaxy.

Start off as an untrained Bakugan Brawler and must fight your way to the top of the heap. Combining the drama and story of the cartoon series with the skill and strategy of the card game, players will become completely immersed in this unique title. Throw Bakugan cards onto the battlefield, and then try to carefully shoot your Bakugan balls onto the cards to unleash their monstrous powers. When two Bakugans stand on the same card, they transform into gigantic creatures and fight to the finish!

title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold: The Videogame
Bleach: Dark Souls
description: Always hot in the Anime market Japanese films have become legendary and experienced many seasons but still enjoyed and received by viewers. Bleach is one of the brands that have operated for more than a decade, and until now dirty products continue to attract many new viewers and retain the familiar audience. The key lies in the fascinating and novel content, exploiting Japanese traditional spiritual elements.

title: Bleach: The Blade of Fate
description: In the Anime world, Bleach also has a strong position because the viewers of this series are quite a lot, haven’t they? Mentioning that it has been operating for more than a decade. With such achievements, it is easy to understand when it is also transformed into a game many times. Bleach: Blade of Fate 2007 is a pretty good game on this topic with the fighting style described precisely what happened in the game. Players will have to admire what Treasure and SEGA have done with their products.

title: Blue Dragon Plus
description: Experience of a classic RPG, players will have to fight systematically rather than expressing individual skills to win them all. Blue Dragon Plus 2009 is a game based on that game redesigned to operate on DS devices. Before that, it was quite popular because its characters were designed by Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). However, the story of this game is written by another writer, not Akira, so there is no similarity except that the character has other characteristics like the famous Dragon Ball. But actually, it also achieved a lot of success thanks to its version of the game as well as anime episodes based on game content.

title: Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow
description:
Perhaps this is one of the fascinating works thanks to the use of familiar design icons. One can also quickly recognize the characters and backgrounds drawn by Akira Toriyama thanks to similarities with the legendary Dragon Ball. Blue Dragon’s first game and anime were simultaneously released on two media and quickly won the hearts of many people.
Blue Dragon: Awakened Shadow 2010 is a story that continues to tell players after the Xbox 360 version critically acclaimed and successful before. With the usual style of the game, this version also follows the form of an RPG. The battle system through the Phantom Shadows will still be central, but there are many innovations that make the gameplay more interesting than before.

title: CTGP-Nitro
description: CTGP-Nitro is the biggest, most ambitious Mario Kart DS Rom Hack to date. Instead of replacing the existing tracks, it preserves the whole vanilla experience and adds new tracks, speedrunning quality of life improvements, online mode adjustments, new skins for characters and much more!

title: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
description:
This is my rifle, this is my stylus.

The signature Call of Duty chaos of battle is coming to Nintendo DS for the first time in a modern day first-person action experience packed with intense sights, sounds, and gameplay.

Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare for the Nintendo DS delivers an arsenal of modern weaponry, arming you with precision controls and touch screen capabilities for battle across the world's most dangerous hotspots. In an unfolding story that parallels the epic, high-octane PC and next generation console Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare, the Nintendo DS title enlists players as U.S. and coalition forces against a rogue enemy. Here, the action rages from land to the skies in all-out combat that threatens the world.

• Nintendo DS Touch Screen and Stylus — Intuitive stylus-based movement controls allows unique ways to construct explosive devices, disarm traps, and perform hand-to-hand combat.
• Diversity of Gameplay — Delivering a variety of combat, Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare chalenges you with with multiple scenarios.
• Experience mobilization as you fast-rope from helicopters, engage hostile forces from an aerial gunship, and experience the ferocity of building-to-building fighting.
• Instant Action — Featuring the signature Call of Duty intensity, the Nintendo DS title delivers an Instant Action mode allowing players to quickly access previously completed missions.
• Multiplayer Support — Using wireless local area network, up to four players quickly ease into the visceral action of modern warfare combat.

title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
description: Regarding shooting games, we probably know about games like Battlefield, CrossFire, Call of Duty, … All of them have Specific characteristics make players feel extremely excited when participating in a battle with it. For Call of Duty, players will play a character serving in a special military unit, fighting for the country. Thanks to that, it creates a very good effect for players. Since 2003, the game has received a lot of support from players and has released new versions of it regularly.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3: Defiance
description:
Modern Warfare is back. The best-selling first person action series of all-time returns with Modern Warfare 3

In the world's darkest hour, are you willing to do what s necessary?

The game takes place in about the same setting as Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and features many elements of gameplay typical to the series, including the usage of iron sights, vehicular missions, and online play. It is also the last Call of Duty game to be released on the DS.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare: Mobilized
description:
The intensity of the blockbuster Modern Warfare series returns to the DS

Call of Duty: Modern Warfare: Mobilized arms you with the latest cutting-ege weaponry, vehicles, and tactics as you mobilize an elite squad across the globe to take the fight to the terrorists. Battle it out online in expanded multiplayer, challenge your high score in Arcade Mode, or face off against an endless horde of enemy soldiers in Survival Mode.

• RETURN TO MODERN WARFARE – Arm yourself with the most cutting edge military weaponry and tactics in the world to take the fight to the terrorists. Wield assault rifles and high-caliber sniper rifles, disorient your foes with flashbangs, smash through the opposition in a massive Battle Tank, or call in an air strike to level an enemy position.
• DIVERSE GAMEPLAY- Fight on the ground in building-to-building tactical combat, hack into enemy computer terminals, take the controls of military vehicles like Battle Tanks and UAV spy drones, or man the guns of an AC-130 gunship and rain down destruction.
• ALL-NEW GLOBAL CONFLICT – Jump between U.S. and British elite military forces battling terrorists across global hotspots, with a new Modern Warfare storyline and missions unique to the DS game.

title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow
description: Series Castlevania has long been famous in the gaming community thanks to its somewhat complicated RPG gameplay. Each game will have its own setup time, telling different stories and unknown people. But all of them are connected by unified gameplay and interactive storytelling. The sequels of the game follow each other; the previous part has the factors that triggered the battle later.

title: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia
description: Dracula is among the most powerful mystical forces that people think of. He seems to be the first and the evilest of the vampires. With such power, of course, he has a demonic army in his sole discretion. Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia 2008 tells the story of heroes, seeking to destroy the demon lord to bring peace to the Kingdom. An emerging hero named Shanoa will be the character you play in this battle. She is a member of a chivalric order called Ecclesia. These people swore that they would use both their lives and powers to fight the evil forces of Dracula. Castlevania is a popular series of Konami publishers. It has been ported to many platforms, and this version can be played on Nintendo’s DS device.

title: Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin
description: A game Role-playing often succeeds if it takes players to engaging stories that make them curious. Castlevania is a series that has been successful in the market thanks to its engaging storyline and gameplay that has many Mystical elements with a character system inspired by the most beloved stories. In this version Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin, allows players to participate in an adventure story where one of the characters will be chosen. These people are all on the way to stop the most terrible conspiracy. The bad guys are trying to revive Dracula’s castle and thanks to the power of this demon to destroy the world.

title: Children of Mana
description: According to many myths in the world, This whole universe is made up of a magic tree, and it affects the strength and origin of all the species there. Children of Mana is a story inspired by that myth and modified in the direction of a game. Nintendo and Square Enix have worked very well to produce products that achieve maximum quality based on the storyline. In this world, the magic tree is named Mana, and it contains all the power of this world.

title: Contact
description: Adventure outer space is one of the most dangerous experiences in the world. If there is an accident, it is difficult to return to your homeland and face many different challenges that you cannot understand. The Professor struggles with his damaged spaceship, all of the alarms are shrieking, and something is wrong here. The Professor and Terry fell into a strange place with a vehicle so broken that it couldn’t be moved.

title: Contra 4
description: One of the most successful platformer-style games of all time is Contra. In this game, the player controls his character to fight along a map running from left to right. Actions combined with shooting make players feel excited with their high tempo. This series has gone through many versions and remakes have received positive feedback. Contra 4 will give players more exciting and new experiences than their brothers. Because it is the youngest of the series, it has been added new functions (although there was a Rebirth version later, it was already a different category). Although it is still the same graphics, it takes players to more new places, there are objects that players cannot imagine.

title: Cooking Mama
description: Cooking is always one of the owners Attractive topics that game exploits over the years but still never before. A simple reason is that players will have to explore recipes from simple to complex. While (everyone knows), in different lands, food is processed in different ways. “Cooking Mama 2006” is a game that gives players the experience of a superstar chef in training. You will experience beautiful memories under Mama’s careful payment and scrutiny.

title: DK: Jungle Climber
description: Donkey Kong is also one of Nintendo’s most legendary and exploited character. Many games took advantage of this character and became famous as well as affirmed the position of its creator. DK: Jungle Climber 2007 was delivered to developer Paon, and after the hatched months, it also launched the market, causing a wave of public opinion in the gamer community.

title: Disgaea DS
description: Disgaea has initially been a traditional Strategy RPG, and later It received a DS remake. Disgaea DS 2008 has received a lot of expectations and has not disappointed players. The old battlefield experiences are correctly reproduced as well as integrating many new functions so that players do not get bored with it. Furthermore, exactly when the DS debuted and became popular, the System Prisma publisher was wise to release a remake for this console. It is still an old game but has added a lot of details, and a host of loveable characters and settings in the plot as well as added convenient controls.

title: Dogz
description: The dog is one of the beloved pets. Most like in the world, and many people want to raise a dog by themselves. They are teaching a good dog, watching him grow up as well as living together as a family makes modern life much happier. But surely not everyone has the conditions to raise a dog like that on their own. Therefore, simulation games are born to be noticeable.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors 2
description: Dragon Ball has been very successful in many fields and many people love it thanks to the pure content and beautiful action scenes. Its anime series has continued to be released a few years ago and has also been an enormous success, not to mention the released continuously titles based on its storyline and character system. Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors 2 is a past DS game, but at the time it also made its mark in this elaborate game market.

title: Dragon Quest IX: Sentinels of the Starry Skies
description: Dragon Quest since the release of the comic version, it has been one of the most popular manga. Tell the story of an adventurous boy in a world where humans and monsters exist simultaneously. The conflict between the two species frequently occurs, making the story exciting and interesting to readers. Thanks to that remarkable success, its official game series released by Square Enix also achieved success.

title: Dragon Quest VI: Realms of Revelation
description: Dragon Quest is already a The story is so familiar to many people because of its favorite manga/anime. Its game is released and improved a lot through the versions, even today some people love it. Dragon Quest VI: Realms of Revelation 2011 is part of its new game with the story being pushed to the top, more complex characters. Many types of power are intertwined, and the twist also makes the problem more unpredictable due to the many variables that can be encountered.

title: Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter
description: Previous words Up to now, usually the game control system is still simple for players to have a consistent system. But since the touch screen technology developed, there are many other ways to control chewing that is created and for example, drawing on a touch screen to control characters using consoles like Wii ™ and Nintendo DS ™. Later, with the development of Smart devices, games like this were not too strange, even the console’s MFi control systems were accurately simulated.

title: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: Echoes of Time
description: Final Fantasy is not only famous for its array of games but also famous for 3D animation. These two entertainment series complement each other and make both of them become the most popular blockbuster of the time. Now it is no longer as powerful as it used to be, but game developers are continually releasing new products that are powerful enough to compete with today’s most popular role-playing games.

title: Final Fantasy III
description: Series Final Fantasy has approached many young players with their Anime 3D series released for free about ten years ago. In general, when the series was released, it made the game’s revenue and popularity much more prosperous. These two brands support each other to PR fame and make them both legends. The game has a lot of different versions, the plot is built in depth and if you find out clearly, just find its Anime.

title: Final Fantasy IV
description: About ten years ago, Final Fantasy had a series of Anime 3D made for all gamers as well as amateur gamers. It merely shows the story of this game genuinely and attracts a lot of people to find this product for testing. In fact, before that, this game has achieved great success. Until now, this game continues to be used by Square Enix with a lot of new releases.

title: Final Fantasy: The 4 Heroes of Light
description: Final Fantasy adventures are never finished. Each generation of heroes born in many ages always has their stories to tell players. Final Fantasy: The 4 Heroes of Light tells about a 14-year-old boy named Brandt, just in the morning when he turned 14, things started to change. The custom of the realm tells you to go to the castle and present yourself to the king.

title: Fire Emblem New Mystery of the Emblem
Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon
description: In the real world or any other world, there are hidden bad guys with malicious intrigue evil. The nature of these things is to give themselves benefits, even though those things will harm the common interests of others. Modeus, too, is a legendary villain mentioned in the Fire Emblem series. The protagonists of many different parts are confronted with this demon and prevent the plan to sabotage the kingdom.

title: GoldenEye 007
description: Agent 007 is one of the most famous people in this profession. He is not a real person, but he is known for his novels, movies and even music. This man has a lot of talent, good-looking and cute so he almost won the hearts of many people. The game also features this character, “GoldenEye 007 2010” is a good example.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Harry Potter is one of the most beloved titles in the world with many fans. If it is about a fantasy world, as a foundation and creating a concept, The Lords of the Ring and Harry Potter are the two most representative representatives. Just mentioning the wizarding world, surely the boy with the lightning scar on his forehead will be referred. Other universes parallel to the different world are the game worlds built by EA. Indeed, it will attract players all over the world who want to experience the heartfelt adventures of a group of 3 people genuinely.

title: Harvest Moon DS: Grand Bazaar
description: Harvest Moon has a lot of different games, but in general, it serves unique gameplay. This type of gameplay is never old because it has so many exciting things to exploit. You can even use it until people stop playing the game to end. For example, other games of mine Marvelous Interactive are deeply absorbed in the exciting moments of raising and harvesting livestock and agricultural products. After having a lot, slowly upgrade everything, a building is built, has unlimited development potential.

title: Harvest Moon DS: Sunshine Islands
description: Harvest Moon is a game brand huge with more than 15 products launched and operated for many years. We can see that although role-playing games are the most popular genre, farm simulation games still retain their form. Harvest Moon is one of the names leading the entire game. We can see through so many versions that manufacturers still keep their creativity. Each game will be a different story that will make players take their time and climate to find out what is hidden behind and solve them. In this respect, if compared to a role-playing game, it doesn’t seem to lose at all.

title: Inazuma Eleven
description: Football games have never cooled in the market so far because of the intense attraction of this sport. Demand for games is always stable, and players are still choosing brand games to play. Inazuma Eleven is a trusted game series in the market with this soccer game because they offer a strange kind of gameplay and unlike any other product. With fighting elements and antagonists added, a soccer match will become more complex and more variable. Also, with open rules, it also requires players to be alert in many cases.

title: Inazuma Eleven 2: Blizzard
description: Big brands often continue extend their successful products to become a long series. This is to retain its available fans as well as attract more curious newcomers about it. In general, it is very convenient for game publishers to take advantage of all their potential. Inazuma Eleven 2 is the next iteration in the Inazuma Eleven series launched in 2012 to be compatible with handheld DS Nintendo. With this release, the repository of Level-5 has been added to the thickness of this already popular series.

title: Inazuma Eleven 2: Firestorm
description: The current football game Now it is trendy, and gamers can easily find a name that suits them on all the download sites they see. Previously, when games were not as popular as now, gaming devices like DS were critical. That is an essential premise for manufacturers to offer exclusive released games. The Inazuma Eleven series is one of the most critical “children” of Level-5 at that time. “Inazuma Eleven 2 Firestorm” is one of the extensions of part 2 and is also popular.

title: Jump Superstars
description: The type of fighting action game is prevalent because of its high speed and direct competition. Jump Superstars 2005 is a highly rated game on the DS console product line. Because the game gathered almost all the most famous characters of Japanese manga at the time. Characters like Songoku, Naruto, Luffy, and many other characters are gathered here with full image copyright. The main reason is that Jump Superstars are under the release of Jump and produced by Nintendo. If you are an Otaku and even a Weeaboo, you definitely can’t ignore this fascinating game. It is like a crossover Universe that Jump and Nintendo created so that fans prove the power of their favorite characters to other characters.

title: Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days
description: Kingdom Hearts is A viral game of Square Enix has been released on many platforms over the years. So it has received the love of many fans around the world. Role-playing adventures with deep and engaging stories evoke curiosity for players. Each game section is treated with great care with stunning graphics and a professional content writing team.

title: Kingdom Hearts Re:coded
description: When participating in this game, you will be surprised by the number of diverse and unique characters in Kingdom Hearts Re: coded 2011. In fact, this is part 2, so you will meet the characters again — familiar as well as face newly created characters. Mickey Mouse, Goofy, many other Disney characters appear in this game to attract players of all ages.

title: Kirby Mass Attack
description: Do not because of the looks but evaluate the power of one Character, Kirby is a typical example. It is one of the legendary characters in the gaming market in general and in particular game consoles. HAL Laboratory entered into the support of Nintendo in terms of publishing and marketing games, the products in this series are always popular.

title: Kirby Super Star Ultra
description: Kirby is a viral character in games designed with fun and cute themes. The need to search on a website that specializes in providing console games, you will easily see dozens of products taking the character of this character. Kirby Super Star Ultra 2008 is an exciting game in the popular game series HAL Laboratory. Beyond the constraints of previous products, this game is updated with graphics and complete scenes.

title: Kung Fu Panda
description: Kung Fu Panda is a video game, loosely based on the film of the same name. The game was released for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, macOS, PlayStation 2, Wii, and Nintendo DS in June 2008. It is about the quest of a giant panda named Po to become the Dragon Warrior.

title: LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes
description: LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes is an action game and the sequel to LEGO Batman: The Videogame. Just like the first game it draws elements from the Batman universe but built entirely in LEGO-style bricks. It starts when a "Man of the Year" award ceremony in Gotham City is interrupted by the Joker and a gang of bandits. Bruce Wayne is a candidate for the award and changes into Batman to pursue them, teaming up with members of the Justice League.

title: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars
Littlest Pet Shop
description: Experience your favourite Littlest Pet Shop pets in a whole new way! Now you can enjoy Littlest Pet Shop on the go on your Nintendo DSi.  Play catch with your pets and their favourite toys, dress them up in adorable new accessories, and keep them happy by brushing and feeding them treats!  You can even throw a little dance party for your pets and help them rock out to cool songs!

title: Lost In Blue
description: Before that disaster, you are merely a young man full of passion for the journey of his cruises. The disaster suddenly struck, and the boat sank to the bottom of the sea, making it seem like all of its passengers drowned. Fortunately, you survive and drift into an uninhabited island. After he calmed down and started to find a way out of the Island, the boy found a 17-year-old girl. She is also looking for ways to return to the mainland, so the two of them work together to survive on this land. If they didn’t know how to create food and shelter in the past, now is the best time to learn it. They have to hunt themselves, find food and build simple buildings to stay. Besides, they also have to create tools to explore the island, which contains many mysteries.

title: Luminous Arc
description: Gods are the origin of the world when they have created socks Everything on this earth, including people. Therefore, if this world is in danger, the gods will also be the ultimate shield to protect everyone from the danger of being destroyed. Luminous Arc 2007 is a fascinating game about the war the gods have joined to protect this world from the most dangerous threat ever. A thousand years ago, the two most powerful forces in the world, carrying in their power almost equal to the gods, began to rebel and want to gain control. Dragons and Witches had a battle against God for the fate of the world. The battle has been going on for a long time, and although the power of God has won, it is still a difficult battle. He had to endure a lot of wounds and lost his strength, so he needed a lot of rest. A deep sleep to recover the injury that he took from the battle is a good idea.

title: Luminous Arc 2
description: Magic is always like that The most potent force can help people reach the threshold of god. The Kingdom of Carnava has achieved great peace since the last four centuries of the story of Luminous Arc 2 thanks to good coordination with the Magic Council. The most powerful witches working for the Witches of the Rev Magic Association have made “The Grand Kingdom” stronger than ever, but after so many years, friction between witches has pushed the region. This land to the brink of danger, all will die.

title: Madagascar
description: Based on the highly anticipated, star-studded animated feature film from DreamWorks Animation, Madagascar is the only console game that lets players enter the world of four hilarious Central Park Zoo animals–a personality-packed crew made up of a lion, zebra, giraffe, and hippo–and their crafty penguin sidekicks. Players must master each animal’s natural skills while adventuring through the exciting city of New York and the dangerous island of Madagascar, interacting with other animals and tackling obstacles and enemies in scenarios from the movie and beyond.

title: Mario & Luigi: Bowser’s Inside Story
description: You must be familiar with Mario’s adventure with his friends to fight Bowser. Through various journeys and different ways of playing, this battle is still never-ending. Nintendo producer is also brilliant not to repeat himself in many different versions of Mario. However, they still retain their quintessence despite the changing story and approach to the game. For example, in 2009, Mario & Luigi: Bowser’s Inside Story is basically a Nintendo DS game platformer, but the true approach to the story makes people feel new.

title: Mario & Luigi: Partners In Time
description: Public Lord Peach created the Mario & Luigi: Partners In Time time machine, but it was the same tool that brought about a massive problem for everyone. When she opened the portal of time, suddenly a bad man appeared and kidnapped her. Shroobs took the princess away and made an evil plan to take over this world thanks to the power of the time machine. This information is told to Mario and Luigi; the two continue their journey to rescue the girl from danger as well as save the world from the evil plan.

title: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games
description: SEGA is an extremely popular brand with a lot of products that are loved by many people around the world. Their most representative work must be Sonic – the Hedgehog. This blue character has gone through his life for more than a decade with many changes, but now it is still a popular name for children. As for Nintendo, Mario has the same role.

title: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games
Mario Hoops 3 on 3
description: Mario Hoops 3 on 3 is a product of a combination of two giants in the Japanese game industry. With Nintendo’s existing Mario brand and Square Enix’s dominant game creation team, they have produced an attractive product. Although it does not follow the available gameplay of classic Mario games, gamers still love it. Mario Hoops 3 on 3 uses Mario’s familiar image and applies the gameplay of a basketball game. Of course, there are many basketball games out there, but this is the only product that uses the hands-on control of Mario Slam Basketball. Therefore, if you are a fan, you should not ignore this game, even though it is a non-canon game.

title: Mario Kart DS
description: Rev up your engines and buckle up for Mario Kart DS! An all-star cast of karting veterans and newcomers compete for glory across 32 fiendishly-designed courses, including Grand Prix, Time Trial, VS., Battle and Mission modes. The first game in the series to feature classic courses from previous Mario Kart titles, it also introduced the new items Blooper and Bullet Bill and an emblem editor for customising your karts. Mario Kart DS is packed with more content than you can shake a Spiny Shell at!

title: Mario Kart DS Deluxe
description: Mario Kart DS Deluxe is a rom hack for Mario Kart DS, created by Rafa4K and released in 2019. It replaces all 32 tracks from said game with tracks from newer Mario Kart games, including Mario Kart Wii, Mario Kart 7 and Mario Kart 8

title: Mario Party DS
description: So far, the Mario series has always been the symbol of Nintendo. Until 2018 this house continued to release new parts of the game based on its most famous brand. In addition to the games designed based on the main storyline and the game is kept through many versions, there are still games that change the way of playing. These titles give players new experiences that make them feel passionate. For example, when you’re tired of having to cross the platformer stage constantly, you can go to puzzle puzzles and specially designed Mini Games in Mario Party are released on the Nintendo DS operating system.

title: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Mini-Land Mayhem!
description: Mario and Donkey Kong are the two iconic characters of Nintendo, enjoyed by many players around the world. If you both participate in a game, it will create positive effects for players. It is true that as soon as it is released, players quickly buy it and experience the most exciting and playful race. “Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Mini-Land Mayhem!” will be an exciting match between Nintendo’s greatest influential people in the world.

title: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
description: Currently, Marvel is well known for its series of movies and is also considered the most successful brand in the comic market. Products other than the film that can include games are also one of the remarkable achievements of these creators. title: Mega Man ZX

title: Mega Man Zero Collection

description: This story is about a persistent battle between honest people and an evil force with the leadership of General Morden. Through many games, we have seen that our main characters have won many times, but after a short time, he and the ghost force continue to return, affecting the peaceful life of the people. title: Metroid Prime: Hunters
description: Today, zombie games are one of the most frequently exploited brands and are welcomed by many. But about ten years ago the topic dominates all gaming forums as robots. Metroid is a great success series in this topic when its game has spread almost all over the most modern handheld console devices of that time. Before the advent of Metroid Prime, the previous games exploited the platformer’s accessible and straightforward gameplay. The simple shooting screen with the journey is styled by a famous 2D side-scroller.

title: Moon
description: When people progress to a to some extent, they will be able to live on other planets, not necessarily Earth. The moon is one of the first targeted targets because people already have a lot of information about it. But now that is just one of the possible hypotheses. The game products talk about this topic a lot; players can search to see a lot of such products on any tool.

title: MySims
description: The Electronic Arts company has been one of the leaders in the gaming world thanks to its products. Their games have a beautiful graphic design style along with a variety of gameplay, attracting players. They have a series of simulation games that have been and are still monuments of simulation games, The Sim. It is so diverse that people think that they are experiencing the world, not playing the game anymore. With so many game portions in its remake version, they use real graphics. But for MySims game, they use the cute chibi design. Thus, they have created a novelty, giving players exciting experiences, attracting them. This is also a premise for part 3 of the game released 3 years later.

title: Need For Speed: Most Wanted
description: Whenever you want to experience a racing game, what famous works do you think? Certainly, Need For Speed ​​is one of the right choices for players. This brand has been renowned since its launch; it is not unusual for many different versions with diverse content.  Need For Speed: Most Wanted 2005 tells the story of a criminal with a lot of enemies in the world and is always chased by police. Joining his journey means that you are forced to become the fastest person if you don’t want to lose your life. In general, the plot makes the game attractive, and there are many problems to exploit.

title: New Super Mario Bros.
description: Mario was so famous for players around the world until now it is still active. Besides, the new products have been updated and progressed, operating many different gameplay styles. You can also follow the Mario homepage to update the latest information. New Super Mario Bros. 2006 is a special version, laying the foundation for future developments of this famous franchise. Its launch made the gamer community more vibrant, after 20 years of the original game being released and running. Although, it is still a platformer that will be “a great new platform for sure twitching.”

title: Ninja Gaiden: Dragon Sword
description: With Japanese culture, Ninja is one of the most powerful and wise forces they create. These people are adept at martial arts and learn things called “jutsu.” It allows these people to use power beyond human imagination to serve their purposes. These people only serve their owners, not the world. “Ninja Gaiden: Dragon Sword” 2008 is one of the latest installments that Ubisoft introduced to their fans in this series played on DS devices. With this game, players are brought to one of the best graphics at the time of its launch. The scenes are designed in full 3D, and the colors are also beautifully adorned. The viewing angle in the battle is also rotated quickly; the battle scenes also make the players admire admiringly.

title: Nintendogs: Lab & Friends
description: Pets are interesting friends that make life human beings much more interesting because of their cuteness. Dogs seem to be the most popular because their cheerful personality dispels the sadness and fatigue of their owners. Nintendo understands that and wants people who own their DS consoles to enjoy dogs too. This is a clever combination when players can play games and can treat a dog properly.

title: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
description: This game is a game that is categorized in a tactical style, meaning that players will use their quick intellect and sharp thinking to win against their opponents. “Not everyone is innocent until proven guilty!” is the motto of this game. No matter how hard and stuck the case is, you still have to defend seemingly guilty client’s innocence. It is the most exciting and stressful case; the table will turn immediately.

title: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney: Justice for All
Plants vs. Zombies
description: Plants vs. Zombies” is one of The most popular game brands on all platforms. Players can catch a product of this series anywhere. Its first version is often seen playing on the PC operating system. But after it developed and was loved by many people, PopCap Games started taking advantage of the brand and releasing it. Currently, if you try to search the name of the game on Google, it will get a lot of answers. Besides, there are many sequel versions with almost entirely innovative gameplay, and even the character system is renewed.

title: Pokemon Dark Diamond
description: Pokemon Dark Diamond (Pokemon Diamond Hack) is a remake of Pokemon Diamond created by two hacker ROMs named Markitus95 and Spiky. Starting the game you will live in the boring Twinleaf town, your only friend is a friendly neighbor boy. One day you and your best friend find Lake Verity, where there is a rumor about a red Gyarados, and also here you get dragged into the big problems related to the town’s survival.

title: Pokemon Diamond Sun and Moon
description: Pokemon Diamond Sun and Moon is a remake of Pokemon Diamond created by two hacker ROMs called Grillo & Lurge. The game is perfectly simulated Pokemon Sun and Moon on the 3DS system, easier to understand, it is the Sun and Moon version for the DS system. Join the game you will easily notice the appearance of the seventh generation Pokemon and you can completely catch and train them as a normal Pokemon. In addition to the above changes, the game is still similar to the original version of the gameplay and storyline.

title: Pokemon Fusion Platinum
description: Pokemon Fusion Platinum (Pokemon Platinum Hack) is a remake of the original Pokemon Platinum game due to two ROM hacker nicknames Grillo and Lugre. The story of the game remains the same with the original version, participating in the game you will be free to explore the fictional Sinnoh area including many different small islands. Here you’ll come across brand new Pokemon never seen before with a total of 493 different types, they are a combination of many types of Pokemon together to create many unique shapes.

title: Pokemon Hoenn White 2
description: Pokemon Hoenn White 2 (Pokemon White 2 Hack) is a remake of the original Pokemon White 2 game created by a hacker ROM nicknamed KingDrapion. This version also gives players a completely new storyline set in 5 years after the events taking place in the original version. During this time, many things changed when Brendan is now a Gym Leader of Aspertia City, and May became an assistant to Professor Juniper. However, Team Aqua continues to keep the old goal when it wants to engulf the whole area, and Team Magma has now learned many things and only monitored Team Aqua to prevent them from breaking the balance between the sea and the mainland. Starting the game you will be a young trainer on the journey to find May the girl and get yourself a starting Pokemon, then you will start a new challenging adventure.

title: Pokemon Mega Platinum
description: Inspired by the original Pokemon Platinum game, a ROM hacker with an intense passion for Pokémon has created a remake called Pokemon Mega Platinum (Pokemon Platinum Hack). The game has a plot similar to the original version, participating in the game you will discover the beautiful island of Sinnoh. Here your main goal is to become a new Pokemon League Champion by catching and training wild Pokemon. You will have to challenge the Gym Leaders to get gym badges before you can beat the champions. In your journey, you will also encounter Team Galactic, who conspires to use Pokémon to create a new world and destroy the old world.

title: Pokemon Mind Crystal English Version
description: Pokemon Mind Crystal English Version (Pokemon Soul Silver Hack) is an exciting remake of the original Pokemon Soulsilver game created by a hacker ROM nicknamed MeroMero. The game was originally created entirely in French but there was another friend named rodygo that translated and produced an English version that we can play right now. The game’s plot is also changed with new characters, gyms, Gym leaders, Elite 4, all renovated. In addition, the game has also changed a lot of features inherent in the original version to help bring a whole new experience to the old game.

title: Pokemon Moon Black 2
description: After Sun and Moon won the League Championship and overcame the final challenge on Hurrah Island, Professor Kukui granted them permission to travel to the Unova Region for a year and put the skills and knowledge they gained in Alola to the test there. Your adversary Gladion followed behind, and the two of you decided on new starters for the expedition across Unova together. It’s been said that members of Team Skull have also been seen in Unova. If Sun and Moon can win the Unova Championship, they will be allowed to compete in the Regional Tournament at the Pokémon World Tournament as the representatives of the Alola region.

title: Pokemon Omega Paradox
description: Pokemon Omega Paradox (Pokemon White Hack) is a remake of the original Pokemon White game created by a ROM hacker nicknamed XxAsterxX. The story begins when a mysterious stranger wears out and destroys the land of Unova, killing many people. Worried that this would continue, some chose to flee, others formed alliances to prepare for the next battle. A month later, you are a lucky man who survived the carnage and was given the opportunity to choose a starting Pokemon to stop the wicked stranger.

title: Pokemon Origin Platinum
description: Pokemon Origin Platinum (Pokemon Platinum Hack) is a remake of the original Pokemon Platinum game. A ROM hacker nicknamed Lazerith with his creativity and a bit of an idea from the hacked version of another colleague Drayano created this unique version. The plot of the game remains the same as the original version and only changes the features that make the game more interesting.

title: Pokemon Sacred Gold
description: Pokemon Sacred Gold (Pokemon Heart Gold Hack) is a hacked version of a ROM hacker named Drayano, who also created many interesting hacked Pokemon versions on the GBA system. This time, inspired by Pokemon Heart Gold on the NDS system, Drayano continues to launch another unique version, but the style of all the versions he created has a certain similarity. There are no plot and map changes, participating in the game you will be adventuring in the vast Johto and Kanto regions, where your task is to challenge the Gym Leaders and finally to challenge the champions to become the new regional champion. What changes in this section is that the experience of the game becomes more charismatic, the balanced Pokemon cause the stronger types to drop their base stats and the weak ones to become stronger and more chosen. Battles also become more intense when opponents will always be level and will have up to six Pokemon to use. In addition, there are many new items added and modified old items, typically the TM will now suit more Pokemon, not just suitable for some types as before. And there are many other interesting things that I will let you discover during play.

title: Pokemon Silver Yellow
description: Based on the original Pokemon Silver Soul version, a hacker ROM with the nickname “brtatu” created an interesting remake called Pokemon Silver Yellow (Pokemon Silver Soul Hack). In the game, you will be playing according to the old story but the experience will be completely new with unique changes.

title: Pokemon Storm Silver
description: Pokemon Storm Silver (Pokemon Soul Silver Hack) is a remake of the original Pokemon Soul Silver game, the author of this special edition is a talented hacker named Drayano, who created many other interesting Pokemon hacks on the old GBA system. If you are a regular user of these hackers, you will know they are similar, when there is absolutely no change in the plot and the map, what he wants to target is Increase the experience of the game. Pokemon will be rebalanced so that the weaker ones become stronger and appear more often. In addition, the battles between the trainers and the Gym Leader become more challenging as their level will always follow the player and all will have a maximum of six Pokemon to use. Some items in the store have also been modified to expand the game as old TMs will be more suitable for more Pokemon and add new ones as well as new items. And so much more.

title: Pokémon Black and White
description: Pokemon is already in the most loved games of all time over the past 20 years. They have released thousands of Anime episodes along with many different versions of games. More than ten games under the main plot and countless other non-canon products have contributed to great success. Even until 2018 there is still a game launched for players to enjoy with top-notch graphics as well as appropriate gameplay for modern players’ tastes. In contrast to the seasoned history of the series, its perfection comes from the Black and White version as it underpins many later versions of the game. It forms the basis for the plot of the games that are later released with complex character systems, completed in a clear order. Besides, 3D graphics with increased pixel density also make things sharper. Moreover, in this game also mentioned very special aspects that the previous version did not mention. Players will experience the real feeling, not like a virtual, emotionless game like previous products.

title: Pokémon Black and White 2
description: Pokemon has been a famous brand in the game market for many years now. In addition to the main storyline games, there are many other products designed so that players can enjoy a variety of different gameplay. Because of that, it became famous and loved by many people during the extremely long period of up to nearly 30 years. Every year, there are still many jealous to use Pokemon brand to release with separate gameplay and attractive to players.

title: Pokémon Conquest
description: Need to introduce it sure many people understand how it works thanks to a game Pokemon anime series so popular. But actually, they have many different variations in non-canon parts. In these sections, things will not follow the main storyline, but of course, the essential point is that Pokemon still exists. However, the battles will take place differently or there is no war at all.

title: Pokémon Dash
description: Pokemon games are many You can choose by visiting popular websites and searching for this keyword. Often the most popular games are in the official series of games that capture Pokemon and train them, to compete with many others and win medals. However, besides the famous ice cream, there are still other products that offer many types of gameplay as well. Pokémon Dash is an official Nintendo product that has been launched and still reuses its copyrighted images. But this time everything will go in a completely different direction than what happened in the popular series. It seems to be classified as an action game rather than an adventure game like what happened before. The characters in the game are incredibly diverse to create winning races. Previously, you had to fight Pokemon by fighting and creating advantages thanks to their power. Now more than 380 types of Pokemon battle each other somewhat. Whoever gets past the obstacles first is Victory.

title: Pokémon Diamond & Pearl
description: Pokémon has been a well-known brand voice in the gamer community as well as the anime fan community. Therefore, its products are also very much interested. Pokémon Diamond & Pearl (2007) is a game released with the same content as shown in the 7th instalment of the manga series of the same name. Following EMERALD’s success, this time it will lead the player to a new world filled with added characters. Game Freak’s imagination is remarkable with these innovative works.

title: Pokémon Heart Red

With the aim of replicating the familiar Pokémon Red game, thanks to the graphical progress of the DS system, it has brought perfection to the game that looks outdated.

title: Pokémon HeartGold & SoulSilver 2010
description: Pokémon has been one of Nintendo’s most successful game series since its foundation. It was also thanks to this success that it has appeared in favorite anime movies around the world. The original beloved Pokémon Gold and Pokémon Silver games were the first products to be released around the beginning of 2000 and attracted a lot of attention. title: Pokémon Platinum
description: If you are a fan of the Pokemon series sure will closely follow its parts on manga, anime, and games. Later on, the world of the game is expanded a lot, leading to the Pokemon also appear more and have a huge amount of power. For example, in part 7, Dialga ™ and Palkia ™ are two Pokemon – the gods of the Sinnoh Region, they have the ability to control time and space here. And Team Galactic is a villain using intelligence and their team to take advantage of their power, profiteering for themselves. Pokémon Platinum 2009 is the sequel and continues the player’s journey against Galactic’s evil plan. This time, another world is exploited, and there is a more powerful Pokemon with a more horrible Dialga ™ and Palkia ™. At Distortion World, space and time do not follow standard rules but become unstable due to Giratina’s power. Your adventure will be faced with Team Galactic, and of course, everything will be evident when the player will also meet with Pokemon outside of the control of time – this space.

title: Pokémon Ranger: Guardian Signs
description: Pokemon ever It is already a famous game brand known by many people. Ignoring the affection that grew stronger in the marketplace. description: The Pokemon brand has been mentioned too much in the market, and until now this Serie game has continued to be released every year and is naturally successful. title: Pokémon Soul Silver Fusion
description:
Pokémon Soul Silver Fusion (Pokemon Suol SIlver Hack) is a product of a talented hacker group including Ebattle, Kenneth, Nolo and Ochistrikitu, inspired by the original Pokémon game Suol SIlver. The plot of the game does not change, participating in the game you will become a young trainer in the journey to explore the vast Johto and Kanto lands and challenge the Gym Leaders to become the next champion. In your journey, you can also collect more different Pokémon in the collection, in addition, you also have to confront Team Rocket, who specializes in abusing Pokémon for evil purposes.
In addition to the familiar Pokémon in the original game, this version brings over 160 different Pokémon including unique ones you’ve never seen.

title: Prince of Persia: The Fallen King
Professor Layton and the Curious Village

Because of this, it is challenging to find a way to break into someone’s home. Until one day the wealthy striker of this area passed away, and he revealed a bit of information before he died that he was hiding a vast treasure on the premises, or maybe where there around this village. And the one who entered was Professor Layton to try to decipher all the details surrounding this considerable treasure.

title: Radiant Historia
description: In the middle of a battle is going on fire and there is almost no end between the two forces with supernatural powers, the tasks assigned are always deadly. Those who enter into a mission that is always prepared to meet will meet the most terrible things to happen to them. The Special Intelligence Agent Stocke of the best players takes on the most dangerous routine escort mission, which goes awry. But this time some things happened, that made history change, and since that time Stocke holds the unique ability of time.

title: Ratatouille
description: In Disney/Pixar's animated adventure, a rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great French chef despite his family's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. When fate places Remy in the sewers of Paris, he finds himself ideally situated beneath a restaurant made famous by his culinary hero, Auguste Gusteau. Fans will be able to relive some of the film's most thrilling moments and experience the sights, sounds and most importantly, the smells, of Paris a la Remy in this game based on the movie.

title: Rayman DS
description: Rayman, with With Mario, Kirby and countless other video game characters have become a part of the global culture of the world. He, as a hero, participated in many adventures and completed countless missions to protect the world. “Rayman DS 2005” continues to be a journey to protect every one of this brave, fearless guy. Thanks to its popularity and success, this game also has many versions released by Ubisoft on many platforms. Players continually participate in battles designed with adventure style. So for each of these games, there will be different stories that are led and with so many variables, suddenly added to help curious.

title: Resident Evil: Deadly Silence
description: Resident Evil is a true Capcom shooter brand that has earned billions of dollars for this game publisher. After more than 20 years of development and success, they have made continuously this game better and more profound both from the storyline and gameplay. The latest part of the game has just been released for a week and has received an average game ranking of over 85% in all gaming platforms. Capcom has owned more than 10 products in this series, but that is only for games designed with the main storyline. There are still non-canon products that are released explicitly on console platforms. Resident Evil: Deadly Silence 2006 is a popular name released on the Nintendo DS. The battle in the city that still takes place with the most diverse and attractive enemies, the most typical is still zombies. In fact, this game doesn’t offer too new experiences for players, but it takes advantage of the power of gaming devices to create a more novel way of controlling. Players will become flexible and have a comprehensive view provided by 2 monitors to the standard controller.

title: Rune Factory 2: A Fantasy Harvest Moon
description: Rune Factory 2 is one of the most anticipated products at the time of its release. Because this is the sequel to the product that is considered the most successful 2009 series of this critically acclaimed “Rune Factory: A Fantasy Harvest Moon.” With a pre-shaped style, players will still be able to participate in a simple role-playing game that combines with the regular work of a farmer. The battles that take place in the game are the highlights that make it more remarkable than other Farm games. It can be said that creating Rune Factory is one of the most remarkable successes of Harvest Moon designers.

title: Rune Factory 3: A Fantasy Harvest Moon
description: Since ancient times, people and demons have been two forces that cannot get along because of the relationship of blood and species. On the contrary, the relationship was not good since the devil was born with a divine nature to hunt humans for food. Rune Factory 3: A Fantasy Harvest Moon 2010 is an entirely different story about these two opposing species living peacefully together. However, there are small conflicts going on internally within them that make things much more complicated. The people of Sharance and Univir neighbors live close to each other, but nothing has ever happened between them. But when the player starts the story, these two races begin to have uncompromising confrontations.

title: Rune Factory: A Fantasy Harvest Moon
description: Harvest Moon is one of the icons for simulation games when it comes to giving the player a lot of unique experiences. Besides, it is also one of the leading and most sustainable leaders in story development and gameplay. Rune Factory: A Fantasy Harvest Moon 2007 is one of the most exciting combat elements in the series. For example, other games focus heavily on farmers and farming, breeding, this game gives players a true warrior.

title: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Survivor 2
description: What do you do when you know that I’m going to die? Everything looks pretty bad, and everyone will start to collapse. Finally, fall into the predicted death. But Atlus didn’t think so with his game. These manufacturers have come up with an incredibly bold idea and new to bringing players to a world that is not the same as what usually happens. In the beginning, you probably still think it’s put in a Normal timeline of modern Japan. But then strange things will continue to happen.

title: SimCity DS
description: In general, love SimCity brand has become one of the names most favorite gamers in the world construction simulation game genre. Therefore, whenever mentioning a simulation game, people will take SimCity as the standard for everything. If you love this genre but have never tried it before, it is waste. Thanks to its popularity, it is present on many platforms specializing in gaming as well as non-gaming.

title: Solatorobo: Red the Hunter
description: The role-playing game has been so familiar to players all over the world for several decades. Until today, you only need to watch the prestigious gaming sites, you can see at least 5 new RPG games released every day. Solatorobo: Red the Hunter in 2011 was also a successful product on the DS console with a lot of players interested. The game at this time had pretty good graphics, but it could not be compared to the real-world blockbusters just released but not too much inferior.

title: Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood
description: Mentioning the brand Sonic the hedgehog is sure and will relate to one of SEGA’s most famous brands. This game has become a symbol for publishers and has also been adapted into many animated films loved by children all over the world until today. Even in 2018, there are still new titles and episodes released to satisfy the needs of audiences around the world. Perhaps this is a success that anyone wants to achieve.

title: Sonic Classic Collection
description: Sonic – the Hedgehog, was created for children and now it is still implementing its mission with a series of animated series released on many channels and platforms. Now things have changed and are almost completely different from what happened in the early versions. If you are an adult who has spent his childhood with the blue Hedgehog, you can play Sonic Classic Collection 2010 to remember the old, memorable memories.

title: Sonic Rush
description: Sonic is still the most attractive character that SEGA created to this point with a lot of products and numerous character systems. From time to time, every version of the game, it always has a change and adds many interesting characters. In the 2005 version of the game, Sonic worked with a beautiful cat named Blaze. With her speed and her talent, both of them became the strongest couple, able to rescue the powerful and dangerous Sol Emeralds. This weapon should not and should never be allowed to fall into the hands of bad people.

title: Spider-Man 3
description: Spider-Man is Marvel’s most successful brand in the period since the story. This painting has just started to release its products to this day. We can easily see how big the movies that are related to this young man are making a buzz in the fan community. Besides, the game made about this character superhero also received proper attention. Last year there was still a PlayStation game that sparked the community thanks to this Spiderman character. But maybe you still remember the Spider-Man 3 game that works on the DS platform. It also made a product based on the plot of Part 3 in the popular series of director Sam Raimi. By 2007, this was the most anticipated game in the Super Heroes series released by Activision.

title: Star Fox Command
description: Game of shooting the plane from before to This is always popular by many people because its gameplay is quite simple. You can play anytime anywhere. If you are bored, you can take a break because it is not too limited in level and continuity in gameplay. Often these games will work in 2D vertical screens; challenges will fall from the top of the screen to the bottom and players must continuously shorten those goals to achieve their goals.

title: Suikoden: Tierkreis
description: Suikoden: Tierkreis 2009 is a game released as a product. The first of this series on the Handheld system and also extended to the Nintendo DS. Previously, this series was popular on PlayStation when it was released in Japan in 1995. Going through many different parts, it has achieved the expected success for Konami publisher. After being widely known for expanding its products to various platforms and Nintendo DS is one of them. Suikoden: Tierkreis 2009 is an officially released version and is also the first version to run on this console. They are calculated as a content spinoff that was no longer too relevant to the main storyline — still retaining the quintessential features of a role-playing action game that many people love.

title: Super Mario 64 DS
description: Super Mario 64, the classic 3D platformer for the Nintendo 64, arrives on the Nintendo DS with all-new features that take advantage of the portable system's dual screens, touch screen, and wireless multiplayer capability. Like the original game, Super Mario 64 DS challenges you to find all the power stars hidden throughout the royal castle in the effort to free Peach imprisoned inside the castle. This time, you can play as Mario, Luigi, Wario, and Yoshi, each of whom has unique abilities. Overcome the challenges on your own or battle up to three of your friends in the multiplayer modes.

title: Super Princess Peach
description: Mario and Luigi have always been the main characters with their ultimate heroism and fighting skills. All the dangers that Bowser thought of were directed at Princess Peach, causing the two heroes to help. Of course, of all the challenges they have ever had before, they have succeeded and saved the cute pink princess. Because of this, everyone thought she was useless and could not do anything in this game. But that’s corrected in Super Princess Peach by a completely reversed story.

title: Super Scribblenauts
description: Scribblenauts is a new game style, making players have to learn a bit before playing skillfully. With puzzle style, it needs a lot of intelligence from players to overcome challenges. To make it easier to understand, the game is a combination of an adventure, combined with drawing and using moves to play. Its interest has received the support of many people. The most obvious proof is that it has up to 2 parts on the DS and many other variants on popular console platforms.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass
description: The Legend of Zelda is one of the most sought-after RPGs. All Time. During its more than 30 years of operation, there was no time when it was not well known. The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass 2007 is a product from Nintendo publisher and is also operated right on Nintendo console DS. This shows an exciting integration and brings many positive results for the version. It will be the next game of The Wind Waker when Link wakes up in another world and knows that the body opening has been lost and alone in unknown seas. The adventure will be lovely as it was in the previous parts, giving players a high-definition RPG experience for this genre.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Spirit Tracks
description: A lot of years have passed since The Legend of Zelda series released and lots of players received it warmly. Now it seems to have diversified platforms and can be played on many different devices like Android and iOS. But in the past, it could only be played on console devices. The version of 2009 is very much loved by many players because of its perfection in gameplay. The Legend of Zelda: Spirit Tracks 2009 after 10 years is still being searched and played. So if you join the game, you can invite 3 more people to form a 4-person team and play on Nintendo’s DS console. The journey will be extremely interesting if you can go along with your friends, if you encounter difficult scenes, you can coordinate with them more smoothly.

title: The Simpsons Game
description: In the most famous American animated films, The Simpsons series is one of the names that always appear. This proves that these characters have become an indispensable symbol in their popular culture. Its content is funny and close to reality that makes many people feel both funny and expensive lessons in life. Thanks to that, all related products received a lot of support from players. The Simpsons Game 2007 is an entertaining game, inspired by these popular TV characters. Not only that, but it is also a product developed by Amaze Entertainment and Electronic Arts. With such favorable conditions, the game quickly expanded and became famous as soon as it was released.

title: The Sims 3
description: Simulation games are now one of the most popular. There are even more famous names than today’s favorite RPG games. The Sim is the most popular world-built simulation game emulator series to date. Although The Sim 3 has been around for nearly 10 years now, there are still many people looking and playing it on many platforms. Using a smartphone can quickly download it even on iOS or Android. But if you have a Nintendo DS, don’t hesitate to use it on this device. Players will have a fascinating experience with a lot of characters designed with diverse graphics and fun. Whether your life becomes happy and happy depends on how decisions are made in life. The game will cleverly integrate your conflicts and relationships with your neighbors. Daily life will be reproduced as real as possible.

title: Time Hollow
description: As we all know, once the time has passed it is never possible to return. That’s why people always have to live for the future, so when we look back, there is nothing to regret. Moreover, It is also the way that Human Being makes sense. But if you can miraculously turn away everything that has happened in the past, then everything creates another attraction. That will create a paradox that makes things turn upside down, And even not in human calculations, but will lead the world to ruin.

title: Tomodachi Collection
description: Tissue game There are so many simulations of life that players can choose any product that is available on reliable download media. But almost all of them have a culture and image design very similar to the United States. Therefore, if there is a change worth mentioning, it is the Tomodachi series. Tomodachi Collection 2009 is an old version, one of the pioneers, so it will probably be the most Japanese. If you want to experiment more, the 2014 version also has interesting things that you will admire.

title: Transformers: Autobots
description: Autobots with Optimus is still one of the most welcomed figures in the world. Just at the beginning of 2019, the movie market has embraced the latest “BumbleBee” child of the Transformers franchise. Combat robots of all sizes and shapes have fought for many years to protect the earth, against their evil comrades called Decepticon. Through many movies and comics, the game market cannot lose in this race. The products with their image are also many and reworked many times. Transformers: Autobots is also a product with attractive action gameplay, reflecting this fierce battle. If you feel interesting with it, there is a piece of small information like this: Actually, Vicarious Visions has released a pair of games that go together as Autobots and Decepticon to show two opposing sides with two corners look different. The game that I am introducing, the player will play an Autobot with familiar characters like BUMBLEBEE, BARRICADE, and others.

title: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Spider-Man is one of the most successful creative products of Marvel Studio in general, Stan Lee in particular. Evidence that it has received a lot of fans during the process since its debut so far. Successful concerning comics, we don’t discuss anymore, neither are movies. With thousands of issues released along with 3 different Spider-man movie versions, it has brought a tremendous amount of revenue. But we can mention another strong front of this hero is the game. In 2005, Ultimate Spider-Man on Nintendo DS also caused a stir in the gaming community.

title: Wario: Master of Disguise
description: Mario You all know, so what about Wario? Those two are Mario, but Wario is the one disguised to participate in an attractive TV Show. This variation makes many people feel happy and renew the feeling of gaming with this product. Once, when Mario was watching TV, he was interested in a character who could disguise himself as someone else to steal the name of the thieving master of disguises. He has a wand that can quickly change costumes and offers a variety of different powers. Mario has already dived into the TV, steals thief’s quick-change wand and takes over a show.

title: WarioWare: Touched!
description: Wario is one of the most bizarre, funny and attractive characters in Mario’s legendary game series. He is not a hero; he just wants everything to benefit himself. Therefore, after falling to the manhole, he recognized an attractive device called the Nintendo DS. It has dual-screen and makes the experience much more attractive. Double the number of screens, the money is also doubled !!!! Wario begins to enlisting the help of his bizarre crew to create one of the most fun and engaging games. “WarioWare Touched! 2005” really succeeded with its microgames and was highly appreciated in this series.

title: Yoshi Touch & Go
description: Yoshi is one of the most favorite sub-characters of the Mario game. He is also a hero with strength and countless times to save the world. So, but the heart of exploiting the character’s full potential is evident. “Yoshi Touch & Go” is a product released around the beginning of the 21st century and uses Yoshi as the main character. In fact, every hero character in the Mario series later has a series of games for themselves.

title: Yoshi’s Island DS
description: Nintendo is famous for its Mario series and has produced many products and versions to make the most of this brand. We can see that Mario’s world has been dramatically expanded compared to the original. The characters involved also have their games and also achieved desirable successes. Yoshi also has his own games in his own series. Super Mario World 2: Yoshi’s Island is stated by Nintendo itself as the product of the greatest side-scrolling platformers ever made.
